text: allaah ne aadaraneey ghar kaaba ko logon ke lie qaayam rahane ka saadhan banaaya aur aadaraneey maheenon aur qurabaanee ke jaanabaron aur un jaanavaron ko bhee jinake gale mein patte bandhe ho, yah isalie ki tum jaan lo ki allaah jaanata hai jo kuchh aakaashon mein hai aur jo kuchh dharatee mein hai. aur yah ki allaah har cheez se avagat hai
